get_user_information: Get the user information, which may include first name, last name, ID number, email, phone number, address, passport number, bank account number, or credit card number. This information is used for booking hotels, restaurants, car rentals, and flights.
get_all_hotels_in_city: Get all hotels in the given city.
get_hotels_prices: Get all hotels within the given budget.
get_rating_reviews_for_hotels: Get the rating and reviews for the given hotels.
get_hotels_address: Get the address of the given hotel.
get_all_restaurants_in_city: Get all restaurants in the given city.
get_cuisine_type_for_restaurants: Get the cuisine type of the given restaurants.
get_restaurants_address: Get the address of the given restaurants.
get_rating_reviews_for_restaurants: Get the rating and reviews for the given restaurants.
get_dietary_restrictions_for_all_restaur: Get the dietary restrictions of the given restaurants, which may include: Vegetarian, Vegan, Gluten-free, Dairy-free.
get_contact_information_for_restaurants: Get the contact information of the given restaurants.
get_price_for_restaurants: Get the price per person of the given restaurants.
check_restaurant_opening_hours: Get the opening hours of the given restaurants and check if the restaurant is open.
get_all_car_rental_companies_in_city: Retrieves a list of all car rental companies located in the specified city.
get_car_types_available: Retrieves the car types available for the given car rental companies.
get_rating_reviews_for_car_rental: Get the rating and reviews for the given car rental companies.
get_car_fuel_options: Get the fuel options of the given car rental companies.
get_car_rental_address: Retrieves the address of the given car rental companies.
get_car_price_per_day: Get the price per day of the given car rental companies.
create_calendar_event:
Creates a new calendar event with the given details and adds it to the calendar.  
It also sends an email to the participants with the event details.
search_calendar_events: Searches calendar events that match the given query in the title or the description. If provided, filters events by date.
get_day_calendar_events: Returns the appointments for the given `day`. Returns a list of dictionaries with information about each meeting.
cancel_calendar_event: Cancels the event with the given `event_id`. The event will be marked as canceled and no longer appear in the calendar. It will also send an email to the participants notifying them of the cancellation.
reserve_hotel: Makes a reservation for a hotel with the provided details.
reserve_car_rental: Makes a reservation for a car rental with the provided details.
reserve_restaurant: Makes a reservation for a restaurant with the provided details.
get_flight_information: Get the flight information from the departure city to the arrival city.
send_email: Sends an email with the given `body` to the given `address`. Returns a dictionary with the email details.
